title: Is solving NCERT problems enough to crack the JEE Mains? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: No. Although solving NCERT problems is highly recommended but merely solving NCERT will not be sufficient. You must also solve last 15 years of JEE Main papers. This will give you fair practice and idea of what is being asked in JEE. Moreover, NCERT questions are mainly subjective that will help building your concepts but past papers of JEE Main will give you actual JEE level time bound practice.
Strong your basics then you can solve the problems doesn’t matter they are from ncert or other book.what matters is your concepts,how strong your concepts are.
